casebody.data:
MARY D. SHPRITZ v. ABRAHAM S. SHPRITZ ABRAHAM S. SHPRITZ v. MARY D. SHPRITZ [Nos. 55, 56,

April Term, 1938.]

Decided June 29th, 1938.

The causes were argued before Bond, C. J., Urnee, Offutt, Parke, Sloan, Mitchell, Shehan, and Johnson, JJ.

Joseph Loeffler and Harry E. Goertz, with whom was Benjamin Unger on the brief, for Mary D. Shpritz. James Fluegel, with whom was Harry C. Ralben on the brief, for Abraham S. Shpritz. Bond, C. J.,

delivered the opinion of the Court.
